about.details:
Incorporated in 2004, Ahmedabad based A-1 Acid Limited is a company engaged in the business of trading of industrial acid and Chemicals. The company offers a wide range of chemical products used in different industries like aluminum, chemical, textile, steel, pesticides, fertilizers, defense, metals, and petrol refineries. It also provides transportation facilities to businesses through its fleet of tankers.

The products are marketed and sold in the states of Gujarat, Maharashtra, Jharkhand, Haryana, Odisha, Karnataka, Telangana, Madhya Pradesh, Rajasthan, and Uttar Pradesh.

A-1 Acid Limited has an agreement with Gujarat State Fertilizers & Chemicals Limited for selling Sulphuric Acid. It has also an agreement with Hindalco Industries Limited and Gujarat Narmada Valley Fertilizers Company Limited as an authorized dealer.

The company's two warehouses are located at Gujarat.

The total revenue of the Company stood at Rs. 9616.50 lakhs, Rs. 10579.67 lakhs, and Rs. 8539.29 lakhs for the fiscal years 2018, 2017 and 2016 respectively.

The PAT stood at Rs. 247.88 lakhs, Rs. 300.04 lakhs, and Rs. 92.48 lakhs for the fiscal years 2018, 2017 and 2016 respectively.

The company has employed one Managing Director, 7 fulltime employees, and 30 temporary laborers.

faqs.question: What is the A1 Acid IPO?
faqs.answer:
A1 Acid IPO is a SME IPO of 3000000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹18.00 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹60 per share. The minimum order quantity is 2000.

The IPO opens on September 25, 2018, and closes on October 1, 2018.

Cameo Corporate Services Limited is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in A1 Acid IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in A1 Acid IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in A1 Acid IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in A1 Acid IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'A1 Acid IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When A1 Acid IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The A1 Acid IPO opens on September 25, 2018 and closes on October 1, 2018.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of A1 Acid IPO?
faqs.answer: A1 Acid IPO lot size is 2000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,20,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for A1 Acid IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in A1 Acid IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.
